mapper.insert: insert into snippets (source_url, type, color_id, memo, user_id) values (#{sourceUrl}, #{type}, #{colorId}, #{memo}, #{userId})
insert into snippet_codes (snippet_id, content, language) values (#{snippetId}, #{content}, #{language})
insert into snippet_images (snippet_id, image_url, alt_text) values (#{snippetId}, #{imageUrl}, #{altText})
mapper.select: select color_id, hex_code, name from snippet_colors where user_id = #{userId} or user_id = 0 order by color_id desc

select * from (
select s.snippet_id, s.user_id, s.folder_id, s.color_id, s.source_url, s.type, s.memo, s.created_at, s.updated_at, s.visibility, count(l.snippet_id) as like_count, st.content as content, null as language, null as image_url from snippets s left join likes l on s.snippet_id = l.snippet_id left join snippet_texts st on s.snippet_id = st.snippet_id where s.visibility = 1 and s.type = 'TEXT' group by s.snippet_id
union all
select s.snippet_id, s.user_id, s.folder_id, s.color_id, s.source_url, s.type, s.memo, s.created_at, s.updated_at, s.visibility, count(l.snippet_id) as like_count, sc.content as content, sc.language as language, null as image_url from snippets s left join likes l on s.snippet_id = l.snippet_id left join snippet_codes sc on s.snippet_id = sc.snippet_id where s.visibility = 1 and s.type = 'CODE' group by s.snippet_id
union all
select s.snippet_id, s.user_id, s.folder_id, s.color_id, s.source_url, s.type, s.memo, s.created_at, s.updated_at, s.visibility, count(l.snippet_id) as like_count, null as content, null as language, si.image_url as image_url from snippets s left join likes l on s.snippet_id = l.snippet_id left join snippet_images si on s.snippet_id = si.snippet_id where s.visibility = 1 and s.type = 'IMG' group by s.snippet_id ) as unioned_snippets order by like_count desc limit 3
